## Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Katherine Hutton
*   E-mail: [katherine.hutton@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:katherine.hutton@cra-arc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (613) 286-5340

## Tender Description

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking to acquire 17 new exterior drop boxes for the delivery and collection of mail. The drop boxes are to be supplied and delivered to designated CRA locations. The CRA is looking for an equivalent model to the Canadian Mailbox Company (CMC) Model 1400 that meets the mandatory specifications. The contract duration will be for one year, with an option to purchase additional units. A resulting contract from this RFP process will include four one-year option periods for purchasing additional units.

The evaluation of proposals will be based on mandatory criteria, financial proposals, and the selection methodology as outlined in the tender documents. Bidders are required to comply with the bid solicitation requirements and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the lowest bid evaluation price score will be the highest ranked responsive bid.

Tenders must be submitted using the Connect service provided by the Canada Post Corporation and must be received by 14:00 EST on April 19, 2023. Any delays in submission may require direct email to the Contracting Authority. The contracting entity reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers.
